ygData.subject: Re: Screech
ygData.msgSnippet: I d describe the range of screech as very small , but it seems to vary I ve found.  I can be hitting cyclopses with melee and they can be hitting me, and
ygData.messageBody:
I'd describe the range of screech as "very small", but it seems to vary I've
found. I can be hitting cyclopses with melee and they can be hitting me, and
they're somehow outside the range of the song. But with giants, they seem to be
affected from outside melee range.

The range is less than lullaby or chords of dissonance though, certainly.

Jyzan

kbachman wrote:

> From: kbachman <kbachman@...>
>
> Just what is the range of a Screech? I just got it and was testing it on
> goblins in Misty and Beholder, and it seems to me that it only works on
> stuff very close to immediate melee range. It seemed to be a very
> small area. Is this true? Or does it take awhile to kick in? Or does
> range increase with level? I did enjoy watching four goblins drop
> everything and flee in terror. Hehe.
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 27 songs, Innoruuk
>
>
